content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach sitting by the water. i noticed the objected b/c of the dime greenish glow of its lights, it stood out against the black sky. i first thought it was a plane just passing above me. the object sudenly stoped in place and hovered for minutes then went in sharp angels always returning to the same spot. after 2 minutes or so of this it went strait up into the sky. i didnt know what to think or what i was seeing, i knew that some planes can hover but none could move is such sharp angels as this did. i then relized what i saw.I finaly lost sight when its glowing lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disk shape, with 2 lights on end. hovered for duration then shot strait up

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home form a hunting trip i was sitting in the window seat. i first noticed the object not really thinking anything about it but then after about 10 minutes i looked up again and saw it again and it was about the same distance away from us earlier but we had probably gone about 100 miles or so. when i first saw the object i thought it was anohter plane. the objects actions werent anything real unuasual untill it went away it seemed to go one way then turn completly around and just sort of took off going west. my reactoin was kind of disblief i had never seen a ufo but had always wanted to see one but im still not sure what it was. there was about 5 other people who took notice to it too on the plane. i lost site of the object when it went the oppsite way that the plane was heading.
content.summary: Saw it about 5 miles out the left hand side of an airplane

content.detailedDescription: I was at home asleep..My dog wanted out. i went outside and saw the "stars" moving. thought my eyes were just tired and acting jittery but immediatley realized things were actually moving in the sky. 2 objects were "dancing" with each other. they went up and down left and right. 1 of the dancing objects was blinking the other object was solid. to the right of these "dancing objects were 2 very bright lights and below them a 3rd blue light not as bright as the others. they moved but not irradically.. at times the clouds were behind these 3 objects to the right. my reactions to the dancing lights and other lights were amazement , confusion, slight fear, excitement. this went on for a very long time... finally around 4:20 am they got further away (the dancing lights) and took position stationary in the sky ( my thoughts were "they are trying to look like stars now") i was very tired and thought that it was pretty much over but i went back to peek about every 10 minutes. the "hovering only slightly moving lights (2 bright white, 1 blue) stayed where they were. at about 5 am when i came to peek again for the 3rd or 4th time the dancing lights were at it again! dancing together..During the whole thing the dancing lights were or seemed further away than the other lights but still pretty close..They dance down to the tree line and then back up further away and then left and right and down again...Over and over.. finally they just disappeared around 5:30 maybe 5:40...Not just blinked off or anything but just sord of faded away. tonight i have been checking obsessively to see if there is any strange activity in the sky or if the 2 bright lights and blue light are there.....Thinking that if they were stars (which i know they weren't, but am trying so hard to understand the whole thing) that they would be in their position or atleast nearby (since it is not 2:30 am here yet) but there is no sight of any of them. ( i did take tons of pictures and video......They are all too dark... i did however do negative imaging and lightened imaging on the digi photos and saw many orbs in the pictures but did not see any of the phenomenon that occurred...I was very disappointed. today i am developing film from my regular camera that i grabbed. also there were 2 witnesses...My mother and father.. i woke them up. how could i not....We stayed up and watched the entire thing. could you please tell me if anyone has reported this sighting as well from the sacrament/elverta area of california the am hours of july 31st 2005. i reported it here because i respect your orginazation. by the way my father did call channel 3 news here when it was happening. they said they had no other reports and he said he felt really silly like they thought he was joking or crazy. i would appreciate a response from you so much. thank you.
content.summary: 5 strange objects in the sky. 1 was blue. silent.

content.detailedDescription: Was in one of my bedrooms and glanced out the window which faces west... i saw a very bright light that isnt usually there..  got out the binoculars  to investigate closer.. i saw it for just a brief moment at that time....The following nite it appeared again in the exact spot.. once again i got the binoculars and proceded to watch it this time for about 30 min.. the next nite it wasnt there  nor the following nite  but 3 days later it appeared again... it shows up about 4 or 5 nites a week..... it may be hovering over that particular area all day and decends when it becomes dusk... it seems to land in the same spot. the lites upon landing ( if it is landing ) seem to get more intense, and create several colors, red blue and yellow.. i dont think it is a planet or  something that belongs there as it isnt present every nite.. so that led me to watch it daily... it is extremely far away for any type of photos, as i cannot see it clear with the help of binoculars
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Is visible  between  dusk  approx  830  till  arround 9 pm    it hovers over the tahoe basin almost nitely for about 30 min then decends like a slow landing into the forest, i watch it with my binoculars but the lite is so intense i cannot make it out

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting in my car in the lake oswego wizer's oswego foods parking lot for my wife to finish her jazzercize session when i happened to notice a very dark, small object above some douglas fir trees.  i got out and photographed the "drifting" party balloon-like object, taking a continuous series of seven photos.  within a few seconds a second similar object did the same thing, and i got eight photos this time. my wife just got out of her session, but the ufo was too small to be seen then.  within a few minutes, two fighter jets swept the area going from east to west then turning north something like the two ufos did.  i got three photos of the jets.  the ufos were similar to what dark black (very black) small party balloons might look like.  curiously, one photo in the first sequence, which should have had the ufo did not.  all six of the of the others did.  for further discussion and analysis of the event, see the oregon mufon web site at oregonmufon.Com.
content.summary: I photographed two very dark globular ufos "drifting" from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: While driving on the a6112 towards preston in the scottish borders my wife and i noticed bright lights through the trees,once we turned the corner a ufo was stationary in front of us and as i stopped the car the ufo moved off .The ufo headed towards us,after i observed the ufo a vehicles headlights appeared behind so i moved off;at this time the ufo was directly above us.A few seconds later on stopping my car we observed the ufo disapear over the tree line.
content.summary: Witnessed lights then ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at met hospital,windsor, ont.,western campus, around 1 in the morning and i noticed the ufo out the hospital window, 4th floor. i called in 2 other nurses and they witnessed it also, as well as some patients. it seemed to drift slowly above the detroit river and then it stopped for a few minutes and then it slowly hovered away heading towards detroit area. it looked like a typical ufo right from the beginning. it was saucer shaped with a dome on top and a red revolving light underneath. we were all stunned by it and stood watching it for a while. it just slowly drifted away out of sight over time. it was also near the ambassador bridge (very busy international crossing) so there must have been a lot of other people that seen it as well. i would be interested in knowing if any others reported it also.
content.summary: A typical flying saucer with a dome and circling red light drifted and hovered over windsor and detroit area.
Saw an approx 250 ft craft, approx 1000 ft away at 5 to 10 mph....Craft was very bright and lit-up the night.

content.detailedDescription:
it was 1963 during a baseball game. i had hit a single and was on first base. the first baseman (jimmy steffens) and i were looking in toward home plate anticipating the next pitch. off in the distance above the head of the batter was a tiny light like a star. it came from the horizon at an unimaginable speed. the sky was clear except for a cloud right above our heads. the height of the cloud was unknown and covered an area the size of a pizza pie held at arms legnth. this thing came at such a speed as to be beyond anything we have ever seen. it entered the cloud and was the size of a dime held at arms length. it did not exit the cloud as expected rather it sped off in the same direction that it came.The reverse direction only took 2 seconds and took off in the same direction that it came in at such a speed that by the time we started yelling the other players missed seeing it as it disapeared in the distant horizon. later that night we were all playing hide and go seek.Jimmy and i chose a hidin place together. what happened to jimmy and myself is too bizzare to tell on paper. i am afraid if i explain it you will think of me as crazy. i have not seen or heard from jimmy since about 1965 however his wife came to my office around 1985. she was helping a friend but asked me if anything strange happened to jimmy and myself. i said yes i didn't elaborate and neither did she i knew she was talking about what happened that night. 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
content.summary: Came from a distance incredible speed reversed course and left at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: See attached file
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large ufo with associated ground phenomena and missing time

content.detailedDescription: Brown and round, shot green to the ground
content.summary: Brown and round

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying a quiet afternoon on my backyard swing. it was a mild day considering the very hot and humid days we have had recently. the sky was bright blue and the humidity was very low, and there were no clouds in the sky. looking in the distance i could see a very bright star. the first star of the evening to make its appearance. i remarked to myself of how bright it was....It did not appear as an object or a plane but clearly as a star. dulles airport is to our west, far enough that we can see the planes approaching and leaving but not hearing any noise. i thought to myself that it was interesting that a star could be so bright in the heavens that none others were to be seen at that hour. i sat there watching it for over twenty minutes as the trees in front of me framed the view between their branches. it did not move in any direction but held steady, but to my amazement in an instant it was gone as if someone had turned off a light.....I was stunned i sat there for a whole hour trying to understand what i had seen. whatever it was it emitted light like any very bright evening star ,the light trailed from its corners as it does a star. the sun had set minutes ago but the sky was still bright.
content.summary: Appeared  like a bright star in early evening sky, held steady for twenty minutes before disappearing in an instant.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a smoke and just happened to look up. there was a very shiney object spinning moving north to south. i am close to the philadelphia airport and i could see several aircraft in the sky and could easily see that this object was much higher. i could tell it was spinning because the way the sun would bounce of it in an interupted way. it was spinning. the revolutions were uniform as in revolving about every 2 seconds. i thought it might be a weather balloon but i am not sure if weather balloons spin. i lost sight of the ogject after 30 or 40 seconds due to some large white clouds in the sky. i of course also thought that either its a ufo or i am seeing a satalite in broad daylight due to the sunshine. i would love to know what i saw.
content.summary: Round, shiney, rotating, aprox 40,000 ft, moving south, possible aluminum coated weather balloon, not sure

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work,ihad just let my dog shannon out  she started barking about something.I looked around i looked up then i saw it i knew it did not belong .It was round it had about 5 cloured lights,it looked silver.It just stayed right up in the sky.Then a plane came in from the north  and the ufo just shot off very fast the plane chased it.
content.summary: Round silver with about 5 differant lights

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work,ihad just let my dog shannon out  she started barking about something.I looked around i looked up then i saw it i knew it did not belong .It was round it had about 5 cloured lights,it looked silver.It just stayed right up in the sky.Then a plane came in from the north  and the ufo just shot off very fast the plane chased it.
content.summary: Round silver with about 5 differant lights

content.detailedDescription: Hi i was driving near hamilton ontario with a friend of mine earlier this evening we were leaving his parents at 12:22 pm. we were driving down the back road from his parents farm house when i spotted what looked like a strange helicopter in front of us, it had many lights on it including a large spot light and it didn't move like a helicopter but it was floating, and it didn't look like a helicopter either. we stopped the car and rolled down the windows as it passed over us and it made no noise at all!!! we were puzzled and watched it float over the field to our left, then all of a sudden all the lights went off and it disappeared!!! judging by how it moved i'd guess it was some kind of vertical take off jet but it was by far the strangest thing i've ever seen in my life. 2 minutes after it disappeared i called 911 reporting it to the local police. despite how crazy i felt reporting it they took my call quite seriously and are looking into the matter.
content.summary: I spotted what looked like a strange helicopter in front of us, it had many lights on it including a large spot light

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:25pm, i went out to the garage to put some laundry in.  i noticed that there were two still spotlights aiming up into the sky from the direction of the bob hope airport.  the spotlights were both aiming south.  shortly after this, i noticed the sound of an approaching jet.  thinking that perhaps a plane was going to have to make an emergency landing or something like that, i stood in the yard scanning the sky for the plane.  the sound continued for a while until suddenly i noticed, more or less directly overhead (and heading south (in other words, moving in the direction of the spotlights (away from the airport))), 3 reddish flashing lights in a triangular pattern.  the lights moved together indicating either three separate planes moving in formation or...  one massive triangular craft extremely high in the sky.  the object moved very slowly, accompanied by that same jet sound.  i called for my wife to come out and we both watched it slowly move away.

seconds later, the spotlights from the airport moved together, then farther apart, then back to where they were.  a couple minutes later, helicopters appeared overhead (3 or 4 of them) and then 10-15 minutes after that, the spotlights began to move back and forth across the sky.

the spotlights remained until about 10:05pm when they switched off and now everything is quiet and back to normal.
content.summary: Unusual craft (or crafts) seen over burbank

content.detailedDescription:
i was out on the south facing 3rd floor balcony smoking when i happen to notice the 3 lights hovering, i keep binoc's on the balcony for various occasions, after watch the lights for a couple of min's, i used the binocs to see if i could get a better view, but the power was too low. after appox.3 mins.One by one, starting at far left, i belive, the light faded quickly one after the other.
   after appox.35 to45 secs. another row of lights appeared directly above the first line only this time there were 4 lights instead of 3... these lights lasted appox. 4 to 5 mins. then reapeted the same process of distinguising, one after the other.

   as a note that may or may not be relitive, after the last lights went out, at the ten o-clock position- relitive to the other lights-  for a brief flash, there was a light the same color as the others that appeared to be moving off towards the south-east, this light was visible for only a flash, but i have grown around aircraft and had a father who worked with nasa so i belive when something is odd.
content.summary: it started off with 3 yellow lights in perfect horizontal alingment for appox. 5 to 7 min. then one by one the light disapears then in a line right above 4 simular lights appeared and remained for appox.7 min.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter heather 31 yrs. friend laura (an abductee) myself fifty five, mother of four, grandma of four,(possible abductee) were sky-watching at the dark cemetary only three blocks south of my home in amo. all were tired and saw the yellow bright globular object as we had given up to leave. (i have seen a number of them since i was 7yrs. old and have many ufo dreams.)
     
     at first it seemed fixed, but we stayed with it thinking it a planet and were rewarded with a real freak show. talking outloud to one another as we watched we described to one another what exactly we saw and all agreed as to movement and direction although my dau. heather could not see the little white lights and i admit you really had to be patient and very still to see one as they were quite quickly launched and disappears within a second.
     laura finally fell asleep on the warm tarmac and my cat wanted to return home(no reaction on cat's part) but it was (the object) not directly overhead, instead could have been easily over plainfield or even indianapolis.
     movement was slow and it would glide, hop and stairstep up or down and seemed to respond to our attention as silly as that sounds. we were very happy to see this and all felt it was probably a mother ship dispensing smaller scout ships  but who can know really. could  be fairies or russians for all we can prove.
    sky was very clear and object was well above tree line and one airplane obviously was much higher up and also its tragectory was not an arc as in satellites or diagonal as in the indpls. air traffic but isolated in a small area and although it did many tricks it still stayed within its self-designated area. have been trying to form group here or join others but having trouble. people don't always show up. the local mufon meetings were the best and i need to be on your list for future meetings. more to tell but that's all i have time for. i got what may be a message from them as i was falling asleep. only 3 words, "are you ready?" i said yes.
content.summary: 3 people watching at cemetary see one bol yellow in east approx. 30 degrees, object manuevers horizontically, vertically, bobbles, loop-de-loop twice and emitting tiny white lights very faint from bottom at random. very playful. we had all talked them dow

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were planning on staying out in that field overnight.  we were on the east side of boom island, near the river.  we were walking towards a small bridge when this gigantic silver round on the bottom object hovered over us. we looked at each other- and then at the thing obove us and watched to see what it was going to do. it only stuck around for a few seconds. it was very large and ball shaped and seemed to float at first but then it rose at high speed into the air above us.  it got smaller and smaller than i saw a small flash of orange and then there was nothing to be seen.  our reactions were like 'wow', what the hell was it that we both just saw?'
content.summary: A friend of mine and i were standing in the middle of a field when a large metallic thing appeared out of nowhere.  it was shaped like a ball.  it appeared and then it lowered over us and then it stayed for a second or two then it took off at high speed,.

content.detailedDescription: The object was just above the the water,on a tilt,it stayed there for about a minute,then slowly went horizontle,it "s colour was a bright orange(the light look like it was spinning,it looked almost alive with colour). this was on a fishing trip that i was on,i was on the starboard side when myself and six other"s saw this object,it was 2:48 am,i notice the object when it just appear in the dark night sky,it"s really dark out on the gulf of mexico at night,it was like instant light that appeared,very bright orange,beautifull colour,it was not an oil rig,space shuttle,plane ,blimp or other vessal,i know what they look like out there at night.I reached for my camara to take a picture but the battery"s were dead, they were new,and i had 12 shot"s left on the roll,after that about a few seconds went by and it just blink out,gone.The battery"s on the camara were brand new from the tackle shop when i got them they were only in the camara for a few hours and worked untill then,even the light"s on the boat dimmed before the object blinked out,i am still beside myself about this,ever since this sighting i fell differant, like when i am out fishing at night ,i being watched,(iam not crazy like when i tell other what i saw).I just want to know what was this and why did it show it self to me?
content.summary: Was on a tilt,then went horizontle,very bright,then just blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I was assigned as a supply clerk with the army nike hercules missle site at caswell maine in 1963. there were four (4) missle sites surrounding loring sac base. i was in the radar van delivering parts when suddenly all hell broke loose. radar had picked up an object flying from west to east approx. 12 miles inside the canadian border. all four of the missle sites had picked up the oblect. the van officer had tried repeadily to contact the object to no avail. loring afb had picked up the object & had its fighters in the air. all of the missle sites had sounded the alert & had the missles raised on their launchers. the tracking board used to detect planes & subsequently the flight of a missle was locked onto the object. the estimated speed of the object was 600 mph suddenly the object stopped "completely" and went straight up. the van officer was shocked & lost for words. gentlemen he stated we just had an equipment glitch. yep we did! & also three other missle sites, a sac base & norad............
content.summary: Controlled flight east to west along us border stopped suddenly then went vertical

content.detailedDescription:
It was the evening of july 15th 2005 my husband and i were observing the stars from our patio in denver colorado.  we were looking through our binnoculars they magnify 20x. we had been observing mars and her moons as best we could. the view of the moon was magnificent.  we had noticed that a few of the stars we could see that looked like they had red white and blue lights on them but seemed to be moving with the constelations we assumed that the freeky twinkle of lights was maybe caused by the planet mars. we were watching them close because we had never seen them twinkle like that as apposed to the other stars which looked just like any star through our binnoculars. my husband had given up and gone to take a shower about 11:45pm i started to go lay down, but i went back out onto the patio and wanted to have just one more look at the star i was observing...I set the binnoculars up on the stand i found the star i was looking at and then it dissapeared i thought what? right then the ufo came into view the first second it was making a machanical move either the triagles were moving into it, or the star part of the ship was moving into the triangles it was only for a second that took place the next four seconds it was a square with a light like cross and the bright one in the middle the others dim off white color of light emmiting from them.I tried to count them but could not deciede if i saw five and the middle light on each side of the cross or x  it seemed to thrust to the south i could swear i heard it to it sounded like someone lit a big torch and as it tipped to the south the lights went out and the ufo and sound was gone. i could not see anything on the top side the bottom was illuminated by the lights ....The lines that go from the lights that make it look like a peramid or an eye of god, or maybe stairs kind of   i was shaking terribly i don't know why i was so frightend .  i ran to the bathroom and got my husband to come out side and i was shaking my heart was pounding...We never saw anything again.
i have painted some water paintings of what i saw. ok when all was over i looked at the clock it was 12:15am which would be july 16th 2005.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I was on the patio viewing the stars through our 20xbinnoculars on a stand when the ufo moved into my view it was big and squair with a big lite cross or x accross it in lights it shape changed in the first second the other four it thrusted to the south

content.detailedDescription:
1. i where on a lake in a town called rottach-egern taking a walke with my mom and her dog.
2. the existenz as a light point as fare as i could see it.
3. i wasn���t sure
4. it`s was a lightpoint that was standig very low in the air.
it was totaly quiet.
after a while it started to fly away in about 70���.
5.During the event i was looking at it, woundering what it could be.
after the event i kept on thinking about it, by i was very sure about that, that it must be an extraterestrian flighing obekt, because there is nothing else in my knwoledge from earth, that can act like that objekt.
6. i lost sight, because it flew inside or behind a big cloud, and i think, that it disappeard afterwords.
content.summary: A relativly small light point, that started to fly up after about 5 minutes in about 70°

content.detailedDescription: I am kinda guessing the date (i can find out the exact date however because we were coming home from church function). i was heading east on chase. i looked to my right (south) and up above what you would call "mt helix" was a glowing red light. i opened our huge sunroof in our forester (3x3ft!) and we were stopped at a light for a while... i watched. it seemed fixed in location. my husband thought at first it was moving until we stopped and he looked too and saw it wasnt moving. it faded for a minute then came back. if anything it might have been gaining altitude as it seemed to get smaller and dimmer.. but then came back. i swear it looked like someone had lit a candle inside a red paper bag... or orange... kinda cross between the two. it wasnt huge but it wasnt small. it wasnt that high up either. i kept my eye on it telling husband to hurry home so we could get binocs. we got home (about 1 min away.. about 1/8th mile away) and ran back out. by this time it was quite dim bug again came back. not really changing posistions but again seemed to come back down lower a bit or at least get brighter. it was never bright like a light really... it seems more "organic" if that makes sense... it didnt blink or anything but it "flashed" or "flickered" i guess is better way to put it. it would both get brigher and dimmer variable. there was at one point some slight movement. almost like it was being jarred. if i could guess i would say (from what perspective i did have which wasnt much) that it maybe moved 15 ft in any direction pretty quickly, again like it was being bounced around or jarred. almost like it "wobbled". it would get quite dim when this happened. it was just slightly foggy or maybe just a bit cloudy. as it got dimmer, and more "flickery" i had a hard time telling if it was "going out" or "leaving" or being covered by fog/cloud layer. i know for a fact that other people saw it because i saw other people looking out their windows on the drive home. it was very obvious in the sky. i was really suprised that i didnt hear anything about it. i once saw a blimp (my first live viewing of one actually) come from very far away that was lit up on the inside.. it was a saturn blimp so it too was red... and i thought it was a ufo at first until it got closer of course. my first thought was that was what this was and it was just moving away from us. but because of its movements and behavior that was totally ruled out, especially after having watched it for so long. in total from the time we first saw it, until it was out of site, was about 15 minutes!  i watched the news but didnt hear anything. i was too afraid to ask anyone if they happened to see anything....
content.summary: Looked like a glowing red balloon like a flame inside something.

content.detailedDescription: Woodworth louisiana sitting on a public beach in a campground very bright object in sky like it was observing us me and 2 other people thought it was a plane object was stationary then it went dim then pulsated then turned off like a light bulb we were like what was that i said i know what it was this area i have been witness to 3 sightings lost sight of object because it disappeared.
content.summary: Early morning hours of the 20th of july    very bright light in the sky i would say toward the east

content.detailedDescription:
It was a bright summer morning and i had just visited the bathroom.  i sat down on the edge of my bed and looked out of the window across my home town of abergavenny, south wales, u.K.
it was then that from the corner of my eyes that i noticed something entering my field of view from the right of my line of sight.  it was only just above some trees, which are in the local public park and about no more than 150 yards away from my observation point, line of sight. 
my glance, in which i assumed a conventional aerial vehicle was coming into sight, quickly turned into a wide eyed stare. this was no ordinary vehicle type that i had previously observed!
it was about the size of a large family saloon, saucer/disc shaped and dark metallic in colour.  the main distinctive feature, ( as if the rest of the vehicle was not distinctive enough), was a narrow flat band which broke up the shallow squat base of the disc, from the deeper top part.  
this band had black rectangular slats in it and it appeared that this band was rotating about the circumference of the disc in an anticlockwise direction, (observing from underside), while the rest of the vehicle remained static to the direction of travel.  the band was spinning at the same speed the vehicle was moving across my field of view.  could this be part of the propulsion system?
it moved perfectly straight and level at quite a slow speed - say 5-10mph or so best guess.  there were no lights and no sound at all.
i remember calling my parents, who were still in bed to come and see this unusual sight, but they were out of it.
i wished i had some film in my camera, as i observed it disappear to my left, again above some trees.
over the next few days, i scanned the news and papers, for anyone else who had seen it.  not a thing.  i can not believe that this object crossed over my town so low and one else saw it?
sadly, i have never seen anything of the like since that day.
content.summary: Metallic car sized squat disc with central rotating slatted band crossed my horizon about 150yds away.  no lights, no sound, in bright summer morning daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving east on avenue j, just past 30th street east. we saw it appear in the sky ahead of us. we had no idea what it was.
it had a large light on each end, next to the large light there was two rows of vertical lights. the large flashimg light in the middle with two small lights above and below it. the other side was the same. it didn't last long enough to have any reaction, it just disappeared.
content.summary: Bar of lights

content.detailedDescription:
While walking down a dark street i saw two balls of light advancing toward me,one amber one red.I first took them to be head and brake lights from a car on the nearby parkway but they came right at me in an up and down motion.They stopped when i back-tracked and advanced when i moved forward.Not wanting to turn my back to them i walked back wardsto the end of the street.I then walked around a few blocks to get to the other end of this street.As i approached the corner i became aware of a very low frequency hum and a flickering light in the sky,it was as if the whole atmosphere was vibrating.I then noticed two balls of light about the size of softballs once again advancing toward me.Again i backed away and they went out.I then noticed to my right a large white object behind some trees.



icould not determine its shape through the trees.It was not glowing just a non reflecting white.At this point i felt a bit scared and that i had seen enough.I felt like i shouldn,t be seeing this-like something was warning me to stay away.My fear now overcoming my curiosity i fled and went home.I felt tired and weak the next day.My teeth hurt for several days.I think the low frequency hum loosended my fillings.
content.summary: Large white object of indeterminate shape emmiting very low frequency hum.Also two small balls of light,one amber one red

content.detailedDescription:
i've seen sightings from my area on here and most of them are explained by wolf's furniture's "spot light sale" in near-by altoona, pa. they do it once a year and it can be seen from as far as ebensburg(30miles away). i also jumped to conclusions when i first saw the display of circling lights. as far as the "jumping" light that changes from white to red to blue... what you are witnessing is a star. the red and blue are a result of scattering. white light is made up of red,o,y,g,blue,i,and v. i'll bet you if you watch it close enough you'll also notice the o,y,and g. as for the jumping, that is a trick your own eyes are playing on you because of a light target and a dark reference point(usually a pine tree). obviously i am or was a skeptic. april of 2005 this all changed! i am now a believer but still very logical.
   my girlfriend and i were travelling on old22 from cresson summit toward cresson. half way down the hill i noticed a very bright star in the horizon. i pointed it out to my girlfriend. suddenly she said it turned blue and i looked to find it to be true. it was then obvious that this was a moving object coming in our direction. when it was about a mile away and approaching it was now red (still only seemed to be a single light). we made it to the rite-aid parking lot and got out to watch as it flew overhead. i saw at least 50 other people whom should have noticed. when it flew over sheetz (gas station where there were many oblivious patrons),it was approx. 200' off the ground and completely silent.We now could see 5 red lights stretching at least 40' apart from each other. i want to say it was v shaped but it was imperfect. we jumped in the car and followed it back up the hill toward rt.220. my car was going the same speed as the object. 35mph. we entered the highway to persue when it stopped only to start travelling back down the hill(toward the direction it came). as it turned around, i started to blink my headlights to see if i could coax a reaction. it just kept going. i had to drive to the next exit (gallitzin) in order to turn around and get back to cresson to follow. by the time we got to cresson summit exit, we could not find it anywhere. a couple days later, i was sitting in the parking lot at work still trying to make sense of it. i thought it must have been a helicopter. then i noticed in the distance a helicopter about 1000/2000' in the air. i did not even have to get out of the car to hear it. i am amazed with what we saw and would like somebody's logial explanation. by the way, i also noticed , in the following days, cresson's electrical supply (i think it's called a sub-station... i don't know the term...It's a bunch of xfmr's and towers and what not)is right under where it turned around....
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 200' up and silent...Resembles none of the other sightings on this sight
